name: package-installation-verification
description: Verifies package versions and APIs before installation to ensure knowledge cutoff assumptions are correct

config.prompt_injection:
⚠️ KNOWLEDGE CUTOFF REMINDER:
Your knowledge cutoff is January 2025 (or July 2025 for newer models).

Before installing packages, you MUST:
1. Check the current version: npm view <package> version
2. Review the changelog: npm view <package> readme
3. Verify the API hasn't changed since your cutoff
4. Check for breaking changes in recent versions
5. Look for security advisories

Do NOT assume the package API you know is still current.
Verify first, then install.

See: .claude/rules/knowledge-cutoff-awareness.md for full protocol.
